texto: 15504 is one which:  uses an assessment process that at minimum meets the requirements specified in ISO/IEC TR 15504-3;  is based on an assessment model(s) that is compatible with the reference model defined in ISO/IEC TR 15504-2 for the processes assessed;  uses a comprehensive set of indicators of process performance and capability;  produces process profiles using the process attribute rating scheme defined in ISO/IEC TR 15504-2; and  has objective evidence retained that demonstrates that the above conditions have been met.
